# About this Manual {-}

This is the official reference manual specifying the syntax and
informal operational syntax of the Stan programming language.


## Copyright {-}

All contents of this manual are copyrighted by the Stan Development
Team.  Exact attribution of material is available through GitHub.


## Licensing {-}

The manual is licensed under the CC-BY ND version 3.0
license.  The code included in the manual is licensed under
the BSD 3-clause license.


## Web resources {-}

Stan is an open-source software project, resources for which are
hosted on various web sites:

* [Stan web site](http://mc-stan.org/): links to
the official Stan releases, source code, installation instructions,
and full documentation, including the latest version of this reference manual.

* [Stan forum](http://discourse.mc-stan.org): message board
for interacting with the developers and other users about
all things related to Stan.

* [Stan GitHub organization](https://github.com/stan-dev/stan):
source version control for the core Stan source code and manuals.
